meanings.sent1: She is so overcredulous that she falls for every prank.
meanings.sent2: Being overcredulous can sometimes lead to being deceived easily.
meanings.sent3: His overcredulous nature made him believe that pigs could fly.
meanings.sent4: The overcredulous child thought the magician's tricks were real magic.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of being overcredulous can be quite embarrassing.

meanings.sent1: The overcredulous student believed every word the fortune teller said.
meanings.sent2: People who are overcredulous may be taken advantage of by others.
meanings.sent3: His overcredulous behavior led him to trust even the most dubious characters.
meanings.sent4: The overcredulous audience was easily swayed by the charismatic speaker.
meanings.sent5: Being overcredulous can sometimes cloud one's judgment.
